ISceneLightPoint Interface Reference
[SCENE+ Module]

import "sceneplus.idl";

Inheritance diagram for ISceneLightPoint:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

SCENE+ Point Light.

A specialisation of the ISceneLight interface.

Call Create function to initialise the point light source.

See also:
FreeWillPlus::SceneLightPoint implementation class.

Definition at line 274 of file sceneplus.idl.

HRESULT GetCreateParams ([out] FWVECTOR *pPosition,[out] FWFLOAT *fRange)
 Returns creation values; these values may defer from the given in Create depending on the actual implementation.

) 
 

Creates the point light (details).

Parameters:
pPosition 3D Coordinates of the light source
fRange Range in which the light operates
fAtten0 Attenuation factor (0)
fAtten1 Attenuation factor (1)
fAtten2 Attenuation factor (2)
Remarks:
This function may be called again to change the creation parameters
